title: Stella Mese
author: Stella Mese
content: as we know, many people suggest investing in bitcoin because the risk is not too high.but if we look at the market there are lots of people buying altcoins, and to be honest I also like to buy altcoins but there aren't many of them, and it's still my biggest investment in bitcoin. and to be honest even though investing in altcoins is risky but I always want to buy and the reason is because of the high pumping..and I want to ask everyone what is your  for buying altcoins, is the reason the same as mine?

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: It's for profit just as the reason you want to buy. During the bull market, it's not just BTC that is going up. The altcoins are also rising and if you believe some altcoins will have adoption like ETH or BNB then it's your option to buy.Just like gambling, however, high risk and high rewards. You invest so you gamble your way because there are also altcoins that don't move an inch. Picking the top ones is what they advice.

comments.author: Kgdktac
comments.body: Why people are always interested in altcoins?Some people believe that they have the potential to increase in value over time, similar to how Bitcoin has risen in value since its creation. Others may be drawn to the technology or features of a specific altcoin, such as faster transaction times or increased privacy. Additionally, some people may buy altcoins as a way to diversify their investment portfolio, similar to how they might invest in different stocks or other assets. I hope this helps

comments.author: DOH!
comments.body: Quote from: Stella Mese on January 27, 2023, 12:32:08 AMand I want to ask everyone what is your  for buying altcoins, is the reason the same as mine?I think the simple reason for all the investments in altcoins has the same goal and nuance to find big profits with minimal funding. Bitcoin is no exception, but between a small and risky investment fund compared to a large investment fund with little risk. It is a choice or launch portfolio in the right way.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Stella Mese on January 27, 2023, 12:32:08 AMas we know, many people suggest investing in bitcoin because the risk is not too high.but if we look at the market there are lots of people buying altcoins, and to be honest I also like to buy altcoins but there aren't many of them, and it's still my biggest investment in bitcoin. and to be honest even though investing in altcoins is risky but I always want to buy and the reason is because of the high pumping..and I want to ask everyone what is your  for buying altcoins, is the reason the same as mine?Many years ago when the firsts altcoins were created those which supported them actually believed on the altcoins in which they were invested and thought they had a chance to bring the market forward, but as the years went by this is no longer the case and the main reason to invest in altcoins evolved and it became on speculation, traders are looking to invest in assets which outperform bitcoin, and while rare there are altcoins which can do it and this generates a lot of interest on them.

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: Most probably because the amount money you need to get into those alts are significantly low while it promises good ROI. If I remember correctly some $SHIB OGs only bought their holdings for a couple of hundreds worth of dollars and turned it into millions worth when that shitcoin pumped. Although, this isn't always the case as thousands of alts/shitcoins are also prone to drastic decline in value especially when the hype for it is over and people started dumping whatever they can into the market.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: QuoteRe: why people are always interested in altcoinsProfit.Altcoins especially the low market cap ones tend to move faster than those altcoins at the top as they are easier to be pumped and dumped by the whales. People don't want to be bored and investing in Bitcoin might be boring for some as it moves slower than altcoin thus, they preferring to invest into altcoins than Bitcoin as their price move faster. Higher risk = higher rewards. We've seen many altcoins that just went up and now at the top out of nowhere. Coins like Polkadot, ICP, Solana etc. Altcoins are way riskier than Bitcoin, but can give you higher profits than Bitcoin and that's the reason why people are always interested in investing into altcoins. Profitability.

Most people invest in altcoins because they want to get bigger returns, and there is nothing wrong with them investing in altcoins. People's mistakes are being too greedy to put their trust in altcoins or being too hasty with the ambition to get rich quickly and forget about the risks they face. I like to invest in altcoins because of their returns but since it's too risky I wouldn't put too much money in them and never put it all in altcoins.

comments.body: Quote from: Stella Mese on January 27, 2023, 12:32:08 AMas we know, many people suggest investing in bitcoin because the risk is not too high.but if we look at the market there are lots of people buying altcoins, and to be honest I also like to buy altcoins but there aren't many of them, and it's still my biggest investment in bitcoin. and to be honest even though investing in altcoins is risky but I always want to buy and the reason is because of the high pumping..and I want to ask everyone what is your  for buying altcoins, is the reason the same as mine?It was actually a practical decision but never I found it wrong. In fact, it was not also advisable to just invest in Bitcoin alone, investing in good altcoins is also profitable. It can't be denied that many people have gained a lot of profit from investing in hyped projects, they got too lucky about it and people got interested in doing this. As long as you are not investing dead coins, that is still fine. Along with my Bitcoin, I have BNB and ETH in my wallet and plan to add some someday when the market had recovered. I'd just wait for the perfect time.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: It's okay if you're also buying altcoins but don't neglect of keeping bitcoin as much as you can. It's like you want to expand your portfolio but you do understand the risk that it has. There's no guaranteed profit but you take the risk and let things do on its own based on the chosen altcoin you've bought.Quote from: Stella Mese on January 27, 2023, 12:32:08 AMI want to ask everyone what is your  for buying altcoins, is the reason the same as mine?My reason is that not all about pumping, you're investing based on your emotions. My reason is just the same as bitcoin and I've chosen those altcoins that had a stable run (not stable coins). What I mean with that, those that have already the foundation and has seen that are in the top now.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: What you said is one of the biggest reasons. High chance for a high pump although the high risk is included. Ain't it all high?  It's an opportunity to hit the jackpot. Many altcoins had been pumping when ICO made a good run on the cryptocurrency industry. I did experience it myself when one of my supported altcoins hit the biggest price on the market. Because of that, I made some good profits and invested it in real estate, for myself and my family. Now, the same thing want to be experienced by altcoin buyers, that one big pump that will change their financial life.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Reasons are; - possible huge profit due to price manipulation/hype - some altcoins have the potential for long-term investment - investing in Bitcoin alone is also risky, choosing a few altcoins is better (at least we have some options)Investing in altcoins is actually profitable provided that it was not a scam project. That is why we should also check the potentiality of the project, not just the price.

But I am here to make a profit and am willing to take the risk as long as they are profitable, I will not refuse. I don't see anything wrong with investing in altcoins, as long as you know what you're doing with your money, you can invest it wherever you think is right for you.Advice to invest in bitcoin and stay away from altcoins there is nothing wrong as people wanting you to be safe, but the decision is up to you as no one will give you any profit, you have to make it yourself, so the decision is in you.
